file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: EufySecurity
  description: This is a documentation of EufySecurity API
  version: 0.1.0
  contact:
    email: nonsleepr@gmail.com
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html

servers:
  - url: https://mysecurity.eufylife.com/api/v1
    description: WebApp
  - url: https://security-app.eufylife.com/v1
    description: Android entrypoint (US)
  - url: https://security-app-eu.eufylife.com/v1
    description: Android entrypoint for EU
  - url: https://security-app-pr.eufylife.com/v1
    description: Android entrypoint for PR
  - url: https://security-app-ci.eufylife.com/v1
    description: Continuous Integration?
  - url: https://security-app-qa.eufylife.com/v1
    description: Quality Assurance?
  - url: https://security-app-sqa.eufylife.com/v1
    description: Short Quality Assurance?

paths:
  /passport/login:
    post:
      summary: Login to EufySecurity
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                email:
                  type: string
                  example: my@email.com
                password:
                  type: string
                  example: cGFzc3dvcmQK
                enc:
                  type: integer
                  example: 2
                  description: >
                    Password encoding:
                      * `2` - base64
                      * any other value - plain
              required:
                - email
                - password
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful login
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                allOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Response'
                  - type: object
                    properties:
                      data:
                        allOf:
                          - type: object
                          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/LoginResponse'
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/401Response'
  /app/get_hub_list:
    post:
      summary: Get the list of the hubs
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                device_sn:
                  type: string
                  example: ''
                num:
                  type: integer
                  example: 100
                page:
                  type: integer
                  example: 0
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                  example: ''
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                allOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Response'
                  - type: object
                    properties:
                      data:
                        allOf:
                          - type: array
                            items:
                              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Hub'
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/401Response'
  /app/get_devs_list:
    post:
      summary: Get the list of the devices
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                device_sn:
                  type: string
                  example: ''
                num:
                  type: integer
                  example: 100
                page:
                  type: integer
                  example: 0
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                  example: ''
                orderby:
                  type: string
                  example: ''
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                allOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Response'
                  - type: object
                    properties:
                      data:
                        allOf:
                          - type: array
                            items:
                              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExtendedDevice'
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/401Response'
  /event/app/get_all_history_record:
    post:
      summary: Get history records
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                device_sn:
                  type: string
                  example: ''
                start_time:
                  type: integer
                  example: 0
                end_time:
                  type: integer
                  example: 0
                offset:
                  type: integer
                  example: -18000
                id:
                  type: integer
                  example: 0
                num:
                  type: integer
                  example: 100
                pullup:
                  type: integer
                  example: true
                shared:
                  type: integer
                  example: true
                storage:
                  type: integer
                  example: 0
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                allOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Response'
                  - type: object
                    properties:
                      data:
                        allOf:
                          - type: array
                            items:
                              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Record'
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/401Response'
  /event/app/get_history_by_time:
    post:
      summary: Get history records (stored in the cloud?)
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                device_sn:
                  type: string
                  example: ''
                start_time:
                  type: integer
                  example: 0
                end_time:
                  type: integer
                  example: 0
                offset:
                  type: integer
                  example: -18000
                storage:
                  type: integer
                  example: 2
                  description: >
                    Storage type:
                      * `2` - this is what WebApp sends
                      * any other number - returns results
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                  example: ''
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                allOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Response'
                  - type: object
                    properties:
                      data:
                        allOf:
                          - type: array
                            items:
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                date:
                                  type: integer
                                  description: Timestamp
                                unviewed:
                                  type: boolean
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/401Response'

  /passport/estimate_domain:
    post:
      summary: AndroidApp - Login to EufySecurity
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                ab:
                  type: string
                  example: "US"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  Domain:
                    type: string
                    example: security-app.eufylife.com
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/401Response'
  /app/upload_devs_params:
    post:
      summary: AndroidApp - Set Device Parameters (Used to set doorbell params)
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                device_sn:
                  type: string
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                params:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceParam'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  Domain:
                    type: string
                    example: security-app.eufylife.com
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/401Response'
  /app/upload_hub_params:
    post:
      summary: AndroidApp - Set Hub Parameters
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                device_sn:
                  type: string
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                params:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceParam'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  Domain:
                    type: string
                    example: security-app.eufylife.com
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/401Response'

  /voice/response/lists/{device_sn}:
    get:
      summary: AndroidApp - List voice responses
      parameters:
        - in: path
          required: true
          name: device_sn
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                # TODO
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/401Response'
  /voice/response/create:
    post:
      summary: AndroidApp - Create voice response
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              # TODO
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/401Response'
  /voice/response/update:
    post:
      summary: AndroidApp - Update voice response
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              # TODO
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/401Response'
  /hub/get_p2p_connectinfo:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                station_sn:
                  type: string
              required:
                - station_sn
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'
  /hub/check_device:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                device_sn:
                  type: string
              required:
                - station_sn
                - device_sn
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'
  /hub/get_dev_info:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                device_sn:
                  type: string
                account:
                  type: string
                  description: "`user_id` from `/passport/login`"
              required:
                - station_sn
                - device_sn
                - account
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'
  /hub/get_devs_params:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                device_sn:
                  type: string
                account:
                  type: string
                  description: "`user_id` from `/passport/login`"
              required:
                - station_sn
                - device_sn
                - account
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceParam'
  /hub/get_rtsp_connectinfo:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                device_sn:
                  type: string
              required:
                - station_sn
                - device_sn
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'
  /hub/reset:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                account:
                  type: string
                  description: "`user_id` from `/passport/login`"
              required:
                - station_sn
                - account
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'
  /hub/aiassis/add_stranger:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                account:
                  type: string
                  description: "`user_id` from `/passport/login`"
              required:
                - station_sn
                - account
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'
  /hub/aiassis/delete_faces:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                station_sn:
                  type: string
                account:
                  type: string
                  description: "`user_id` from `/passport/login`"
              required:
                - station_sn
                - account
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'

  /event/app/favorite:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                monitor_id:
                  type: integer
              required:
                - monitor_id
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'
  /event/app/unfavorite:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                monitor_id:
                  type: integer
              required:
                - monitor_id
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'
  /event/app/viewed:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                monitor_id:
                  type: integer
              required:
                - monitor_id
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'
  /event/app/delete_record:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                monitor_id:
                  type: integer
              required:
                - monitor_id
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'

  /hub/ota/get_rom_version:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                sn:
                  type: string
                device_type:
                  type: string
                rom_version:
                  type: integer
                current_version_name:
                  type: string
              required:
                - sn
                - device_type
      responses:
        'default':
          description: 'Ok'
  /app/cipher/get_ciphers:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                user_id:
                  type: string
                cipher_ids:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: integer
              required:
                - user_id
                - cipher_ids
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                allOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Response'
                  - type: object
                    properties:
                      data:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            cipher_id:
                              type: integer
                            user_id:
                              type: string
                            private_key:
                              type: string

security:
  - TokenAuth: []

components:
  securitySchemes:
    TokenAuth:
      type: apiKey
      in: header
      name: X-Auth-Token
  schemas:
    Response:
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          example: 0
          description: >
            Response status code:
              * `0` - Success
              * `10003` - Failed to request
        msg:
          type: string
          example: Succeed.
          description: Explanation of the status code
        data:
          description: Payload
      required:
        - code
        - msg
    401Response:
      properties:
        banned:
          type: integer
    LoginResponse:
      properties:
        user_id:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
        nick_name:
          type: string
        auth_token:
          type: string
          description: The token used in further communications
        token_expires_at:
          type: integer
        avatar:
          type: string
        invitation_code:
          type: string
        inviter_code:
          type: string
        mac_addr:
          type: string
        domain:
          type: string
          description: Should be used for further communications
        ab_code:
          type: string
        geo_key:
          type: string
        privilege:
          type: integer
        params:
          type: object
    Hub:
      properties:
        station_id:
          type: integer
        station_sn:
          type: string
        station_name:
          type: string
        station_model:
          type: string
        time_zone:
          type: string
        wifi_ssid:
          type: string
        ip_addr:
          type: string
        wifi_mac:
          type: string
        main_sw_version:
          type: string
        main_hw_version:
          type: string
        sec_sw_version:
          type: string
        sec_hw_version:
          type: string
        volume:
          type: string
        main_sw_time:
          type: integer
        bt_mac:
          type: string
        device_type:
          type: integer
        event_num:
          type: integer
        create_time:
          type: integer
        update_time:
          type: integer
        status:
          type: integer
        station_status:
          type: integer
        status_change_time:
          type: integer
        p2p_did:
          type: string
        push_did:
          type: string
        p2p_license:
          type: string
        push_license:
          type: string
        ndt_did:
          type: string
        ndt_license:
          type: string
        p2p_conn:
          type: string
        app_conn:
          type: string
        wipn_enc_dec_key:
          type: string
        wipn_ndt_aes128key:
          type: string
        query_server_did:
          type: string
        prefix:
          type: string
        member:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Member'
        params:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceParam'
        devices:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Device'
    Device:
      properties:
        device_id:
          type: integer
        device_sn:
          type: string
        device_name:
          type: string
        device_model:
          type: string
        time_zone:
          type: string
        device_type:
          type: integer
        device_channel:
          type: integer
        station_sn:
          type: string
        schedule:
          type: string
        schedulex:
          type: string
        wifi_mac:
          type: string
        main_sw_version:
          type: string
        main_hw_version:
          type: string
        sec_sw_version:
          type: string
        sec_hw_version:
          type: string
        sector_id:
          type: integer
        event_num:
          type: integer
        wifi_ssid:
          type: string
        ip_addr:
          type: string
        volume:
          type: string
        main_sw_time:
          type: integer
        bind_time:
          type: integer
        bt_mac:
          type: string
        cover_path:
          type: string
        cover_time:
          type: integer
        local_ip:
          type: string
        language:
          type: string
        create_time:
          type: integer
        update_time:
          type: integer
        status:
          type: integer
    ExtendedDevice:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Device'
        - type: object
          properties:
            svr_domain:
              type: string
            svr_port:
              type: integer
            station_conn:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Connection'
            family_num:
              type: integer
            member:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Member'
            permission:
              type: object
            params:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceParam'
            pir_total:
              type: integer
            pir_none:
              type: integer
            week_pir_total:
              type: integer
            week_pir_none:
              type: integer
            month_pir_total:
              type: integer
            month_pir_none:
              type: integer
    DeviceParam:
      properties:
        param_id:
          type: integer
        station_sn:
          type: string
        param_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ParamType'
        param_value:
          type: string
        create_time:
          type: integer
        update_time:
          type: integer
        status:
          type: integer
      required:
        - param_type
        - param_value
    ParamType:
      type: integer
      description: >
        Parameter type:
          * `1133` - camera upgrade now
          * `1134` - device upgrade now
          * `1140` - ???
          * `1214` - watermark mode
          * `1224` - guard mode (TODO: Add to the parser)
          * `1253` - ???
          * `1271` - snooze mode
          * `2001` - open device
          * `2002` - night visual
          * `2003` - volume
          * `2004` - detect mode
          * `2005` - detect motion sensitive
          * `2006` - detect zone
          * `2007` - un detect zone
          * `2010` - sdcard
          * `2015` - chime state
          * `2022` - ringing volume
          * `2023` - detect exposure
          * `2027` - detect switch
          * `2028` - detect scenario
          * `2029` - doorbell hdr
          * `2030` - doorbell ir mode
          * `2031` - doorbell video quality
          * `2032` - doorbell brightness
          * `2033` - doorbell distortion
          * `2034` - doorbell record quality
          * `2035` - doorbell motion notification
          * `2036` - doorbell notification open
          * `2037` - doorbell snooze start time
          * `2038` - doorbell notification jump mode
          * `2039` - doorbell led night mode
          * `2040` - doorbell ring record
          * `2041` - doorbell motion advance option
          * `2042` - doorbell audio recode
    Member:
      properties:
        family_id:
          type: integer
        station_sn:
          type: string
        admin_user_id:
          type: string
        member_user_id:
          type: string
        member_type:
          type: integer
        permissions:
          type: integer
        member_nick:
          type: string
        action_user_id:
          type: string
        fence_state:
          type: integer
        create_time:
          type: integer
        update_time:
          type: integer
        status:
          type: integer
        email:
          type: string
        nick_name:
          type: string
        avatar:
          type: string
        action_user_name:
          type: string
    Connection:
      # TODO: Reuse in Hub
      properties:
        station_sn:
          type: string
        station_name:
          type: string
        station_model:
          type: string
        main_sw_version:
          type: string
        main_hw_version:
          type: string
        p2p_did:
          type: string
        push_did:
          type: string
        ndt_did:
          type: string
        p2p_conn:
          type: string
        app_conn:
          type: string
        binded:
          type: boolean
        setup_code:
          type: string
        setup_id:
          type: string
    Record:
      properties:
        monitor_id:
          type: integer
        station_sn:
          type: string
        device_sn:
          type: string
        storage_type:
          type: integer
        storage_path:
          type: string
        hevc_storage_path:
          type: string
        cloud_path:
          type: string
        frame_num:
          type: integer
        thumb_path:
          type: string
        thumb_data:
          type: string
        start_time:
          type: integer
        end_time:
          type: integer
        cipher_id:
          type: integer
        cipher_user_id:
          type: string
        has_human:
          type: integer
        volume:
          type: string
        vision:
          type: integer
        device_name:
          type: string
        device_type:
          type: integer
        video_type:
          type: integer
        extra:
          type: string
        viewed:
          type: boolean
        create_time:
          type: integer
        update_time:
          type: integer
        status:
          type: integer
        station_name:
          type: string
        p2p_did:
          type: string
        push_did:
          type: string
        p2p_license:
          type: string
        push_license:
          type: string
        ndt_did:
          type: string
        ndt_license:
          type: string
        p2p_conn:
          type: string
        app_conn:
          type: string
        wipn_enc_dec_key:
          type: string
